explains: adv. 创造性地；有创造力地

sentences.en: He felt creatively and emotionally sterile.
sentences.cn: 他感觉自己既缺乏创造力又没有充沛的感情。

sentences.en: We find solutions by thinking creatively.
sentences.cn: 我们通过创造性的思维找到解决办法。

sentences.en: Teachers should inspire all students to think creatively.
sentences.cn: 老师应该激励所有学生发挥创造性思维。
